nodes.text: Indu San was a location where the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing operated at in the weeks after the Battle of Endor 4 ABY, during which some of their members were killed.

Indu San was mentioned in canon in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed. In Star Wars Legends, Indu San first appeared in the short story "Kella Rand, Reporting...," written by Laurie Burns and published as part of sixth issue of West End Games' Star Wars Adventure Journal on May 1 1995.
